docs.title: TinySHM: Distributed Intelligence Enabling Framework for Structural Health Monitoring
docs.text: This project aims to develop an empowering framework that equips MCU-level IoT devices with distributed computing and intelligence capabilities to facilitate structural health monitoring applications. If you think this project is interesting, please give it a star and stay tuned.

docs.title: TinySHM: Distributed Intelligence Enabling Framework for Structural Health Monitoring
docs.text: This project aims to develop an empowering framework that equips MCU-level IoT devices with distributed computing and intelligence capabilities to facilitate structural health monitoring applications. If you think this project is interesting, please give it a star and stay tuned.

docs.title: TinySHM：用于结构健康监测的分布式智能框架
docs.text: 该项目旨在开发一个赋能框架，使MCU级别的物联网设备具备分布式计算和智能能力，从而提升结构健康监测应用的效果。如果你对这个项目感兴趣，请给个星并保持关注。
